There were no data available for intensive livestock farming treatment levels, all livestock farming treatment levels are assumed as secondary, i.e. 85% treatment efficiency 31. Our approach differs from previous work where BOD loads were based on estimated nitrogen (N) emissions and BOD:N ratios 4.
